argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frgpval.m | |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) |
| 2 |  | frgpval.b | |- M = ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 3 |  | frgpval.r | |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( I e. V -> I e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_xpeq1 | |- ( i = I -> ( i X. 2o ) = ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( i = I -> ( freeMnd ` ( i X. 2o ) ) = ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( i = I -> ( freeMnd ` ( i X. 2o ) ) = M ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( i = I -> ( ~FG ` i ) = ( ~FG ` I ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( i = I -> ( ~FG ` i ) = .~ ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( i = I -> ( ( freeMnd ` ( i X. 2o ) ) /s ( ~FG ` i ) ) = ( M /s .~ ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-frgp | |- freeGrp = ( i e. _V |-> ( ( freeMnd ` ( i X. 2o ) ) /s ( ~FG ` i ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( M /s .~ ) e. _V |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( I e. _V -> ( freeGrp ` I ) = ( M /s .~ ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( I e. V -> ( freeGrp ` I ) = ( M /s .~ ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( I e. V -> G = ( M /s .~ ) ) |
